fields.body:
[{"type": "heading", "value": {"heading": "Skill Challenge"}, "id": "8250afe2-fa81-4916-a1f9-56ce46a57df6"}, {"type": "two_columns", "value": {"left_column": [{"type": "image", "value": 1, "id": "d8961c48-6b6b-4e1d-b7df-06987deaf951"}], "right_column": [{"type": "paragraph", "value": "
  • Fun way to measure your skills in game situations
  • All 4 fundamentals (shooting, passing, dribbling, control)
  • Standard format, graded by referees
  • No scrimmage, so Players are not played out of position or left wanting more touches
  • Over 150 touches on the ball per player
  • Potential to be seen by coaches & scouts
  • Valuable for all positions
  • Data-based way to evaluate players
", "id": "90448ee0-12f2-4a75-94b8-6a3eb994a94c"}]}, "id": "c63e1ed9-4dcc-4f73-93e3-00c979b8904b"}]
